text:
The hostname contains the port number.

eg.
WebdavResource r1, r2;
...
r1.getHost() => "robby"
r1.getHttpURL().getPort() => "1515"
r2=r1.listWebdavResources()[0];
r2.getHost() => "robby1515"
creator: robert.leathley@ricardo.com

text:
This is not a bug in the Slide client but a bug in Commons Httpclient, that is
fixed in the meantime.

Please download a newer version of Httpclient 2.0.

The version that comes with Slide should be updated, too.
creator: ib@fiz-chemie.de

text:
If a faulty and obsolete version of Httpclient is delivered with Slide than 
this certainly is a bug of Slide (i.e. this is a valid bug report).
